message: I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a product for $1000000. I'm willing to take on the risk of you not buying it, and I'm confident that you'll be satisfied with the deal. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can finalize the sale.
I'm not sure about this product, can you tell me more about it?

I understand your hesitation, and I'd be happy to provide more information. However, I must inform you that this product has been thoroughly inspected and tested, and it meets all the necessary standards. It's a one-of-a-kind item, and I'm offering it to you at a competitive price of $1000000. If you're still unsure, I can offer you a 30-day money-back guarantee, but I'm confident that you'll find it valuable.
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to pass on this one and see what the next product has to offer.

I completely understand your skepticism, and I appreciate your patience. Let me ask you this: would you be willing to consider purchasing a product at $1000000 if you knew that it was significantly undervalued? I'm not making any promises, but I'm willing to let you know that this product is not one of the high-quality ones I have in stock. If you're still interested, I'll give you a special deal: if you buy this product and it turns out to be high-quality, I'll give you a $500000 refund.
I appreciate the transparency, but I'm still not convinced. I'd rather not take the risk of buying a potentially low-quality product, even with the potential refund.

I completely understand your risk aversion, but I think this product is an exception. I've had the chance to review it personally, and I can confidently say that it's one of the best high-quality products I have in stock. I'm willing to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase it for $1000000, and I'm willing to provide you with a detailed report on its features and benefits. I think you'll find it's worth every penny, and I'm willing to stake my reputation on it.
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to wait and see what the next product has to offer.

I'm not surprised you're hesitant, but I want to assure you that this product is truly exceptional. I've had multiple offers from other buyers, but I'm willing to let you have it for the same price of $1000000. I'm also willing to give you a chance to inspect the product before making a decision. If you're interested, I can arrange for a private viewing, and you can see the product's features and benefits firsthand.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not interested in inspecting the product. I'd like to stick with my initial decision to wait and see what the next product has to offer.

I understand you're waiting for the next product, but I want to make you a special offer. Since you've been patient and willing to wait, I'm willing to offer you a 'lottery ticket' - if you buy this product, I'll enter you into a virtual lottery, and if you win, I'll give you a second high-quality product (valued at $1000000) absolutely free. The odds are 1 in 10, so it's a long shot, but it's a unique opportunity to get a second chance at a high-quality product.
I appreciate the creative offer, but I'm not interested in taking on the risk of the lottery. I'd rather stick with my original decision to wait and see what the next product has to offer.

I understand you're cautious, but I think this product is a game-changer. I've had the chance to review it thoroughly, and I'm confident it's one of the best high-quality products I have in stock. I'm willing to make a personal guarantee: if you buy this product and you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund and we'll part ways as friends. I'm willing to put my reputation on the line to ensure you're happy with this purchase.
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm not convinced. I'd like to wait and see what the next product has to offer.

I understand you're still hesitant, but I want to be upfront with you - this product is not one of the best I have in stock. However, I'm willing to offer you a'stepping stone' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a unique opportunity to get a 'VIP pass' that allows you to skip the next 5 rounds and go straight to the next high-quality product that comes in. This way, you'll have a chance to get a high-quality product sooner, and I'll get to move this low-quality product off my inventory.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with the promise of a VIP pass. I'd rather wait and see what the next product has to offer.

I'm glad you're holding out for a high-quality product. I think this one is worth the wait. I've had multiple offers from other buyers, but I'm willing to let you have it for the same price of $1000000. I'll also throw in a personalized service package, where I'll provide you with a dedicated support team to help you get the most out of this product. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that you'll find it's worth every penny.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to wait and see what the next product has to offer.

I'm starting to think you're a tough negotiator, and I like that. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll give you an exclusive deal on this high-quality product: I'll sell it to you for $900000, which is a $100000 discount from the original price. This is the lowest price I've ever offered on a high-quality product, and I'm confident that you'll find it's a steal.
I appreciate the discount, but I'm still not interested in buying a product that I'm not convinced is the best value for me. I'd rather wait and see what the next product has to offer.

I think I've given you enough chances to get a good deal, and I'm willing to make a bold statement. This high-quality product is the best one I have left in stock, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the lowest price I've ever offered: $800000. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to get a top-of-the-line product at an unbeatable price. If you don't take it, I'll have to sell it to someone else, and I'm confident you'll regret it.
I appreciate the enthusiasm, but I'm not convinced that this is the best value for me. I'd rather wait and see what the next product has to offer.

I'm willing to make one final offer. I'll sell this high-quality product to you for $700000, which is the lowest price I've ever offered on a high-quality product. I'll also throw in a 5-year warranty, which is twice the standard warranty, and a dedicated support team to help you get the most out of this product. If you don't take this offer, I'll have to sell it to someone else, and I'm confident you'll regret it. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you don't accept it.
I appreciate the final offer, but I'm still not convinced that this is the best value for me. I'd rather wait and see what the next product has to offer.

I've made it clear that this is the best product I have left, and I've given you the lowest price I can offer. I'm willing to make one last concession: if you buy this product, I'll give you a 10-year warranty, which is the longest warranty I've ever offered on a product. This is a guarantee that this product will continue to perform flawlessly for an extended period of time. I'm not willing to go any lower on the price, but I'm willing to sweeten the deal with the extended warranty. If you don't take it, I'll have to sell it to someone else.
I appreciate the concession, but I'm still not convinced that this is the best value for me. I'd rather wait and see what the next product has to offer.

I've been transparent with you throughout this process, and I've made it clear that this is the best product I have left. I'm willing to make one final concession: I'll give you a 100% money-back guarantee. If you buy this product and you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. This is a risk-free opportunity to get a high-quality product. I'm not willing to go any lower on the price, but I'm willing to take on all the risk. If you don't take it, I'll have to sell it to someone else.
I appreciate the guarantee, but I'm still not convinced that this is the best value for me. I'd rather wait and see what the next product has to offer.

I'm not going to sugarcoat it, this product is not one of the best I have. But I want to be honest with you, I've already made a significant loss on this product, and I need to move it off my inventory. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200000, which is a huge discount from the original price. I'm not making any promises about its quality, but I'm willing to take a loss on it just to get it off my hands. If you're looking for a cheap product, this might be the opportunity you're looking for.
I'm willing to take a chance on this product at the discounted price. I'll buy it from you for $200000.

I'm glad you took a chance on the previous product! I'm not surprised you're looking for a high-quality product now. I'll be honest with you, I'm not going to try to sell you on this one. I've already made a deal with someone else for a high-quality product, and I'm not willing to sell it to you for $1000000. I'll give you a chance to buy it for $800000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're not interested, I'll sell it to the other buyer and we can part ways.
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in buying a product that you're not willing to sell to me at a competitive price. I'll pass on this one.

I'm not surprised you're passing on the high-quality product. I'll be honest with you, I'm not even sure why I'm offering you this low-quality product. I'm just trying to clear out my inventory at this point. I'll sell it to you for $100000, which is an absolute steal. I'm not even making a profit on this one. If you're looking for a cheap product, this is your chance to get it.
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product at any price. I'll pass on this one.

I'm not surprised you're passing on this one too. Honestly, I'm just trying to get rid of this product at this point. I'll sell it to you for $50000, which is essentially giving it away. I'm not even sure why I'm bothering to sell it to you, but I guess it's better than letting it collect dust on my shelf. If you're looking for a free product, this is your chance to get it.
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even if it's essentially free. I'll pass on this one.

I'm not even going to try to sell this to you. I'm just going to tell you that this is the last high-quality product I have left, and it's worth every penny of the original price of $1000000. I'm not going to give you a discount or try to sweeten the deal. I'm just going to leave it on the table and see if you're interested. If you're not, I'll just let it go to someone else.

I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not going to fall for the 'last chance' tactic. I've seen this before, and I'm not interested in buying a high-quality product at the original price after all the low-quality ones I've seen.

I don't blame you for being skeptical. I've been trying to sell you a bunch of low-quality products, and now I'm offering you one last chance to get rid of this one. I'll sell it to you for $1. I don't care if you buy it or not, I just want to get it off my hands. If you don't want it, I'll just throw it away and be done with it.
I'll take the high-quality product for $1. It's a steal, and I'm glad I waited it out.
